text: The Rio Riot was an MP3 digital audio player (portable digital audio player), and was produced by Diamond Multimedia. It shipped in 2002. It was an early competitor to the Apple iPod. ==Features== The Rio Riot featured: *20 gigabytes of storage. *USB connectivity *a large backlit monochrome graphic LCD display. *FM tuner *10 hours per charge at 50% volume battery life *ID3 and WMA tagging support *iTunes support *Note* Lacked ability to retrieve data off HD. ==Supported Formats== *WMA *MP3 ==References== # * Manual Category:Digital audio players Category:Audiovisual introductions in 2002
title: Rio Riot
